reviews.review:
超級好玩呀~~~~
這遊戲剛出就接觸了，雖說玩到現在時長很短，但還是真心很喜歡這款遊戲。
有一段時間匹配機制有問題，玩的心態崩轉戰h1z1去了，但總是在其他遊戲玩膩的時候還是想打開來玩一玩。
也結識了很多可愛的夥伴。（雖然沒有很多一起玩 </3）
從之前的聽到心跳就硬著頭皮不回頭往前跑，到現在偶爾還能溜溜屠夫，我也是真的愛過梅格托馬斯的吖~ ;)

진짜 갈수록 패치를 어케 하는지 몰겠다

이놈들 돈벌더니 

돈맛을 너무 알았나
Pienso que juego es entretenido y que deberian de equilibrarlo en cuanto al campeo
很好玩

Всем любителям жанра хоррор посвещается!
Хотите поиграть за жертву таинственных обстоятельств? - Пожалуйста!
Или, быть может, собираетесь примерить костюм какого-нибудь маньяка или призрака, и поохотиться на людей? - Да без проблем!
Чистый мультиплеерный хоррор. История или сюжет полностью отсутствуют. Да этого здесь и не нужно...
Предпочитаете играть в команде за людей или в одиночку за кровожадного убийцу? 
Выбор за вами!

一款特别好玩的游戏~
不明白为什么有人说恐怖~
明明很欢乐好吧~
和好朋友一起开语音 耍屠夫的感觉很开心~
如果你喜欢玩屠夫也没事~
你开个音乐欢乐的屠人~
建议买~~~~ 还是五星好评
很棒的游戏，满足感爆棚
封鎖也要告訴玩家原因 證據，帳號被盜又不是我願意的。
If you value your life, don't.
Мне игра очень понравилась.Рекомендую

Muito divertido com os amigos e sozinho tb, se você não e acostumado com jogos de terror e sangue pode se assustar um pouco no começo, ou se você ja não sente medo disso e ta pensando "quem vai ter medo disso", tem gente que tem mesmo '-'.
拜拜了您嘞

The game is great and they've done a great job balancing it (with some issues here and there). The biggest problem I have is the extremely salty community for the most part. There are some decent people though (mainly the ones that don't mention camping)
People abandon games about 30% of the time and it ruins the game. There is no obvious penalty for it.

If I'm gonna be honest, this game is alright. You definitely need a group, or friends to play with if you really want to play this game competitively, or just care about how the game goes in general. There are a lot of noticeable issues with this game, like latency issues, hitboxes, people being able to get carried by friends to high ranks, nerfing killers that don't need to be nerfed, not changing killers people have issues with, server issues, etc. I personally feel like ebony mori's are too common in the game nowadays, considering every other game they'd have one. Even while at low ranks there were people with ebony mori's. I still feel like the game is very fun, however. I definitely will say that it's one of my favorite games of all time, and even with all of the issues I've listed and more that I may not know about.

Jogo muito bom, nunca deixou de ser legal e engraçado (em uns momentos).
Tirando campers, lagados e bugs, o jogo é muito bom.
很不错。！
R U N
Очень классная и атмосферная не жалею что купил.

對於新手來說不友善
常排到惡魔一堆技能...
玩惡魔遇到一堆技能的人類

This game has a few problems.
1. Peer to Peer connection makes for a possible laggy game and the Host having the advantage.
2. The Killer's perks are simply way too strong. For example, the Nurse's Calling, being abe to see a healing survivor withing 28 meters. The range is a bit crazy considering the Nurse's maximum blink.
3. Autoaim on a Killer. Why in the hell does the Killer have auto aim? This game has a ranking system yet it isn't balance. I get that Killers are suppose to be strong, but holy hell. Autoaim ruins it

Not worth buying yet - 4/10

Reason?

-Terrible Network/Lobby issues since Day 1 Release still not fixed
-Causes Host to crash after Lobby fails to connect 9 times out of 10
-Mike Myers is broken as fuck - Undetectable unless he is on your dick
-All other killers irrelevant 
-Unbalanced

If these issues were fixed then the game would be infinitely more enjoyable.

Not going to lie, this seems like a better game than F13 right now

Just has more to do, Fixing Generators And it feels a tad more polished

Friday the 13th is still a solid game, it just needs alot of work

Hence, why DBD is the better choice right now

O jogo eh incrível, trilha sonora otíma, jogabilidade facil e é bem leve.E muito divertido, vale a pena os R$36,99, mesmo eu comprando com desconto.

o jogo é bom pra caralho, jogar com amigos deve ser uma das melhores experiencias que se pode ter
MAS QUANDO LANÇA 1 PATCH VEM 20 BUGS DE PRESENTE, E ESSA MERDA NAO ENTRA NUNCA, ENTAO VOCE LEVA EM MEDIA, MEIA HORA PRA ENTRAR EM UMA PARTIDA QUE DURA 3 MINUTOS POR QUE OS KILLERS SAO DESBALANCEADOS.
bjos

Pour moi Dead by Dayight et un jeux gaché par la commuté cancer de ce jeux, 1 : tout les tueurs ou plus au moins sont des campeurs sans-race, 2 le matchmaking est nul à chier les devs ont basée les joueurs sur les rangs alors qui devrait etre fait sur le nombre d'heure ou les niveaux et prestiges des survivants/tueurs, 3 l'avantage énorme des tueurs face aux suvivants cette avantage est due au faite que les devs qui joue à leurs propres jeux sont des merdes en tueurs, 4 le focus qui est une technique qui consiste à suivre un survivants pendant toute la partie juste pour faire deux morts, 5 près de la moitié de la communauté du jeux est parite à cause du camp car ormis les rangs 1 qui ont du talent tout le reste camp, il faudrait limite ajouté un objet pour tombé sur un non-campeur. Bref pour moi ce jeux c'est de la merde, les dlc toute trop chère, trop d'avantage en tueur ect...

Je vien de detélécharger le jeux, mais je pense mit remettre quand la communauté sera mieux est les devs arreterons d'avantagé les tueurs.

Au fait mon conseille ce jeux ne vaut vraiment pas la peine !
good game to play really enjoy it.

I really do recommend this game, its an awesome game that is a lot of fun.

99.9% of the time I play as the killer because I enjoy that side of the game the most.

Now you have all these people complaining about killers who camp (not my play style). Surely by now the survivors know that if the killer camps they get less blood points, alot less. Yes it may make the game alot harder for the the survivor, however, if thats how that particular killer wants to play you have two choices. QUIT that match or PLAY and stop being little bitches about it THE END.

Now you have the killer who likes to hook them and hunt (my play style) which gets you loads of blood points. Over the time I have become pretty decent with a several of the killers and when I win or lose a match I always enter in the chat GG (Good Game). Now this is where my main issue comes into play, is survivors who cant hack loosing and the first complaint is no matter which killer you are is that they are OP. Just admit you lost and had a good game or just don't bother playing.
За 500 рублей вам предлагают... ммм... ну вообщем бутылоку вина лучше купите на эти деньги и до кладбища прогуляйтесь, получите гараздо больше ощущений, чем от этой игры

There was a time back in the 90s, where games were not perfect. Everybody was complaining about such games. But they loved them, because it  was accepted. Today everyboy is complaining and they think it's a good idea to change a BASE MECHANIC. 
The designers changed the hole pointsystem for killers. Now its only about killing if you want get a pip. It's no more about the good old hunting points. So sad........because i like DBD,

Desde el momento que vi Dead by Daylight sabía que tenía que comprarlo, y es que es el tipo de juego que me gusta. Partidas rápidas competitivas, es monotemático, sí, pero no te aburrirá.
Si quieres un juego  para echar unas risas con colegas, este debería estar en tu lista, el juego tiene bugs, es cierto, pero, los bugs no te quitan las ganas de seguir jugando.
Poco más que decir +2000 horas y sigue sin aburrirme. Si eres una persona que le gusta jugar por tu cuenta, como yo, el juego te seguirá pareciendo interesante más que nada por su sistema de rangos, yo personalmente recomiendo jugar solo hasta alcanzar tu cúspide y luego intentar jugar con amigos. Sin embargo, si lo que te gusta es medirte competitivamente lo mejor es ir por tu cuenta y ver que tan lejos puedes llegar, el juego vale cada céntimo que pagues por él y no te decepcionará si lo que buscas es pasar un rato de asueto con amigos.

Positif : 
-Concept tueur et survivant 
-Perspective : 1ère personne pour le tueur et 3ème personne pour le survivant
-Capacité unique enseignable pour tous en tant que tueur et survivant
-Mindgame 

Négatif : 
-Générateur trop rapide : un gen pop lorsqu'un survivant est à terre pour le tueur 
-Expérience du jeu frustrant pour le tueur
-Camp et tunnel autorisés
-Perk qui avantage les survivants 

L'état actuel du gameplay pour les tueurs est le plus bas, je recommanderais le jeu si un changement se fait dans ce sens.

un buen juego recomendable para jugar más que nada con amigos.
divertirte un rato.
ya que juegar con 3 amigos adicionales como superviviente, siempre estan esos momentos donde escuchas un grito desesperado de un amigo. :D

Con los diferentes reworks que ha tenido el  juego hay muchos perk que han quedado algo en el olvido, pero aun esperamos que se pueda conseguir un buen equilibro y que la comunidad ayude en lo que es el juego. a hacerlo lo mas justo entre jugadores.
Ya que tiene mucha diversion y adrenalina que sacar

First I have to say this game has Michael Myers in it. That was enough for me. lol The game plays very well and it is very fast paced. I am on edge every single time I play it. It is designed in such a way you have to work with the other survivors in order to survive obviously. It is the first of it's kind and probably the best if I were to be totally honest. The dev team from what I have seen tries their best to work with the community. Also when there are issues they handle them very professionally.

Now I don't normally reference another game in my reviews for a game, but today I am doing so to emphasize what exactly it is your buying here. There is only one other slasher game currently to date similar to this one. That is Friday The 13th.. Now I Beta tested this game and it was fun even if it was abit graphic for my taste and I was just about to buy it until I caught wind of a review here and seen how poorly the developers of that game handled that situation.
http://steamcommunity.com/id/yourwaifuisshitdesu/recommended/438740/
Now I will not get all in to it on this review. This video will explain pretty much the situation in a nutshell for those of you interested.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p3mI0Ic8n-M

My purpose for referencing it merely is this. You are not only buying a quality game, but you are buying a quality development team who handles their customer base with professionalism. That is what you are purchasing for your money. After having seen that it made be appreciate our devs. of this game so much more. I can't even begin to tell you. These guys are so awesome and they are continuously pushing out new and improved content and really if you just want to pretend to be Jason I recommend purchasing the Bloodstained Pack because they have a rock em sock em mask in there that will just give you that Jason Vorhees feel if you must absolutely have it. Personally I am a fan of Michael Myers because the Halloween movies just rocked and let's face it. Jamie Lee Curtis is a stone cold fox. lol ;)

I love the concept and mechanics of the game and I would really want to keep playing it.  HOWEVER, I can not recommend it at all, because I don't see how developer with a mindset like the people behind this game deserve a dime from any player.
Instead of fixing the horrific matchmaking (which matches beginners with 1000h+ players, which basically leads to you getting trolled and teabagged all the time) or any of the bugs in the game, they push out more paid content to milk the player for money. You get discouraged really fast by the shitty matchmaking and the better looking options you would get with DLCs start to look very tempting. Seriously? Screw the devs! This has been a major complaint since release.
Игра стоит своей цены

Pretty cool game and pretty good job so far!

4対1の非対称型対戦ゲームです。
内容は規定条件をクリアして脱出したい複数種類の生存者4人と、特殊能力を持ち合わせた殺人鬼1人が知恵とスキルを凝らして対戦するというもの。
単純に言ってしまえば鬼ごっこですね！

特にPC要求スペックが高いわけでもなく、やり込み要素を考えると価格も良心的。追加DLCで他作品とコラボを行うなど、ファンサービスは意欲的と感じました。

しかし、オススメと評価していますが、現1.53verでは正直、10点満点中5点と言ったところ。

生存者側4人はお互いに協力でき、殺人鬼の行動を阻害する道具やPARK、マップ上にも生存者をサポートするアイテムやギミックが複数用意されています。

上記内容は殺人鬼側にもありますが、生存者より少しだけ移動速度が早い、一方的に攻撃出来る程度(生存者側も特定の行動で殺人鬼を足止め出来ます)が有利と言える条件です。ギミックによる手助けは“脱出に必要な条件をクリアするのに時間がかかる事”以外一切ありません。

ホラーゲームと言うより、パニックゲームと言う方が正しいのでは？と言うのが率直な感想。

殺人鬼側がホストとなる為、回線相性が出やすく、場合によってはまともにゲームが出来ない場合もありますが、遠いサーバーを選択しないなら発生は稀かと。

ゲーム内課金の要素はDLCコンテンツのみであり、お金を投資したユーザーが強いということはありません、純粋に相手の心理を読む、バレずに様子を探る、と言ったプレイヤースキルが試される点は評価できます。

先程書いた通り、PARKやADD ONでキャラクターを底上げする要素もあり、様々な遊び方をたのしめますが、本来エッセンスであるPARKが破壊的に(しかも特定のものだけが)強力で、生存者も殺人鬼も最終的には同じPARK構成になりがち。

生存者側に無敵ポイントと呼ばれる箇所が、様々なマップに当たり前のように点在しているのも評価できません。しかも場所さえ覚えてしまえば、ただ単調にぐるぐる回るだけ、タイミング良くボタンを押すだけ…非常にスリルのない方法で時間稼ぎをすることができます。

殺人鬼側が強力なPARKを搭載して参加している、自分の嫌いな殺人鬼を使用しているとわかった瞬間に接続を切る生存者も稀におり、ゲームのプログラムに現れない殺人鬼側への負荷が酷いです。
殺人鬼の旨味はコンスタントに成長の為のポイントが稼げるくらい、でしょうか？ 現verではそれも怪しいのですが…。

その為か、ホストである殺人鬼が少なく生存者側でスタートする場合、非常に長い時間待機しなければならない場合もあります。

また、ボイスチャットの要素がありません、あるのはロビーでの文字チャットのみ、現状を見る限り、運営側の正しい選択と言えます。このゲームにおいて、ボイスチャット導入は飛躍的に生存者側を有利にしますので、ソフトウェアチートと言っても差し支えがないでしょう。殺人鬼側でやってみるとわかりますが、明らかに連携のスムーズさが異なります。

また、こう言った複数対戦型ゲームのマナーが悪さはどのゲームでも共通ですが、生存者側の遅延行為や煽りなど、ホストである殺人鬼側をうんざりさせる様な状況が頻繁しています。(あまりにも居ないので)殺人鬼側をメインにプレイしていますが、3回に2回は屈伸運動&出口前待機、いつまでも脱出しない方の何れかに出くわします(笑)

殺人鬼側の一存でゲームを終了する事ができるのも致命的、殺人鬼はランクが下がる程度で特にマイナス要素はありませんが、せっかく参加出来たゲームでも我慢強い殺人鬼(笑)でないと、マナーの悪い生存者（上記のマップによるハメ行為や煽りなど）が一人居ただけで、強制終了する場合もあります。(数少ない生存者プレイで切断を体験しています)

生存者と殺人鬼がマナーを守らないと、ゲームが成り立たない要素を含んでいますが、それはゲームの開発側に関係がありませんのでゲーム評価には含めません。

上記PARKの強力さもあり、殺人鬼側では100〜200時間程、経験値を稼ぎPARKを揃えてからが本番なんだろう、と感じています。
気軽に楽しむなら生存者側がオススメなのでしょうか…？自分は待ち時間がもったいないので殺人鬼側をオススメします。

色々と思う所を書き出しましたが、簡単に俺TUEEEが出来るほどヌルゲーではありません、この点は高評価です。

ゲームコンセプトや雰囲気など、非常に良い部分も多いのですが、現ver1.53は明らかに生存者側有利とのこと。それを差し引いても自分は殺人鬼側メインで楽しめています！
今後のアップデートで現段階よりも、お互いにスリリングで刺激的な仕様に変更される事を願います。

Bug by Shitlight... hra, která bývala zábavou. No, nyní podstatou hry je loopování (běhání okolo jednoho místa pořád dokola). Naprosto miluju, jak mají devs této hry potřebu stále něco měnit, hlavně věci, které fungovaly naprosto v pořádku. Například časté a nepotřebné změny UI. Balancování hry byl v posledním půlroce velký problém, jelikož se hráči naučili jak se tato hra má správně hrát, ještě s kombinací, že BHVR svoji hru ani netestují. V podstatě jediný aktivní a zkušený člen teamu BHVR je not_Queen, která však ale je pouze manager komunity. Zpátky v roce 2016/začátek roku 2017 byla hra opravdu zábavná hrát, ovšem hra se změnila takovým způsobem, že už stojí za pěknou píču. Stejného názoru je i většina streamerů/YTberů (zahraničních) například No0b3 to skvěle vysvlětluje v jeho videu "1.9.2 Update Gone Wrong - Dead by Daylight". Dalším příkladem je 72hrs, Logan, Swe a mnoho dalších. Bohužel hra už nikdy nebude tak dobrá jako byla dříve, ale několik věcí se změnit k lepšímu může. Pro nově příchozí hráče je hraní s kamarády peckou a hra je ze začátku i celkem spooky. Později ale pro vás začně bát spíše frustrující, když vás hitne něco, co nemá etc.


Smíšené pocity ale asi bych hru pro nové hráče doporučil.

NEW REVIEW AND NEW THOUGHTS, This game is finally better now I remeber first seeing it with my friends and it looked like a game to pass the time so we got it and it was amazing sure you couldnt really connect to other people but the custom matches were awsome and there was that stage where it looked dead but since its been updated im playing this game more then I am F13 and I am satisfied with my purchase the dlcs are good some useless some good cant wait to see what new killer theyll make next the wide variety of killers instead of one killer with different parts and a variety of characters Im gunna recommend this game to everyone buy it twice cus its that fucking good wut ya say its not worth it? You have to play it to experience it Killer and Survivor try both even if killer isnt youre thing or survivng aint youre thing just try them youll be happy with the different things they can do amazing game 10/10!

Constant connection issues, and ranking will reset.  Have had mine and friends rank reset twice.  So going from rank 9 back down to 20 in matter of seconds when connecting to a new game is just annoying.  Along with randomly being dropped from the game (DC), getting stuck in environment unable to move, lag (so much lag), falling through the exit unable to finish match, rank resets, and so much more.  I'd rank this game up there with Friday the 13th seeing as the developers don't care to fix a buggy game, which is sad because DBD has been out for an entire year.  Save your money or wait till they patch the game up completely.
